name: blocksy-child-blocks
description: Build scripts for Blocksy child theme blocks

scripts.build: wp-scripts build blocks/card-loop-native/src/index.js blocks/card-loop-native/src/view.js blocks/page-header/src/index.js blocks/listing-section/src/index.js blocks/listing-section/src/view.js --output-path=blocks/card-loop-native/build && wp-scripts build blocks/page-header/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/page-header/build && wp-scripts build blocks/listing-section/src/index.js blocks/listing-section/src/view.js --output-path=blocks/listing-section/build
scripts.start: wp-scripts start blocks/card-loop-native/src/index.js blocks/card-loop-native/src/view.js blocks/page-header/src/index.js blocks/listing-section/src/index.js blocks/listing-section/src/view.js --output-path=blocks/card-loop-native/build
